sentences.en: "His memory must be completely back, then?" — "Just about."
sentences.cn: “这么说，他的记忆一定是完全恢复了？”——“差不多。”

sentences.en: a completely new range of low-cost computers
sentences.cn: 全新的低价电脑系列

sentences.en: A number of the French players went nuts, completely out of control.
sentences.cn: 有几个法国运动员简直是疯了，完全失去了控制。

sentences.en: By the 1930s the wristwatch had almost completely supplanted the pocket watch.
sentences.cn: 到了20世纪30年代，手表几乎完全取代了怀表。

sentences.en: He had never completely recovered from his illness.
sentences.cn: 他病后一直没有完全康复。

sentences.en: He seems completely self-contained and he doesn't miss you when you'renot there.
sentences.cn: 他似乎十分独立，你不在的时候也并不想念你。

sentences.en: He spoke no English and was completely silent during the visit.
sentences.cn: 他不会说英语，参观过程中一言未发。

sentences.en: He succeeded with the aid of a completely new method he discovered.
sentences.cn: 借助于自己发现的一种全新的方法，他获得了成功。

sentences.en: I believe that a journalist should be completely objective.
sentences.cn: 我认为新闻记者不应当有丝毫偏见。

sentences.en: I completely forgot that it’s his birthday today.
sentences.cn: 我完全忘了今天是他的生日。

sentences.en: I went to kick the ball and I completely missed it.
sentences.cn: 我去踢球却踢了个空。

sentences.en: I’m not completely sure.
sentences.cn: 我不能十分肯定。

sentences.en: Immediately I've done it I feel completely disgusted with myself.
sentences.cn: 我一做完那件事就对自己感到十分厌恶。

sentences.en: In Europe, Aga Khan III presented himself in a completely different light.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲，阿迦汗三世表现得完全是另一副样子。

sentences.en: Portuguese is pronounced completely differently from Spanish.
sentences.cn: 葡萄牙语的发音和西班牙语的完全不同。

sentences.en: Some stretches of beach are completely underwater at high tide.
sentences.cn: 海滩上有些地方在涨潮时完全淹没在水中。

sentences.en: The flask is completely watertight, even when laid on its side.
sentences.cn: 即使平放，这个真空水杯也是滴水不漏。

sentences.en: Their interests were completely bound up in their careers.
sentences.cn: 他们的兴趣完全是围绕着他们的职业。

sentences.en: They'll have to give up completely on certain of their studies.
sentences.cn: 他们将不得不彻底放弃某些研究。

sentences.en: We were standing onstage playing completely out of time.
sentences.cn: 我们站在舞台上，演奏得完全不合节拍。

words.tran_cn: 完整；完全；完成；圆满；结束
